Docs.summary: Represents audio input configuration used for specifying what type of input to use (microphone, file, stream).

Docs.summary: Creates an AudioConfig object representing the specified stream.
Docs.returns: The audio input configuration being created.

Docs.param: Specifies the pull audio input stream callback. Currently, only WAV / PCM with 16-bit samples, 16 kHz sample rate, and a single channel (Mono) is supported.
The audio data format in which audio will be written to the push audio stream's write() method (currently only support 16Khz 16bit mono PCM).
Docs.summary: Creates an AudioConfig object representing the specified stream.
Docs.returns: The audio input configuration being created.
